channel.title: Question about privacy
channel.description:
Hello. I have a few questions about running 317/377 servers.
Does Jagex care if you are running such server and maybe receiving a little bit of donations just to keep it up, or just running the server without asking for donations at all.
If they cared and wanted to shut me down, would they get some of my info off godaddy for example? Like credit card info, real name, etc.. stuff that I used to purchase my hosting/domain. Can they get my info? Will I get into law trouble?
I hope a few of you had experience with such stuff and can help me out with this. :)

item.title: Question about privacy
item.dc:creator: @Nathan_R Nathan R
item.description:
@Nathan_R wrote:

jagex shut down noobscape, legit.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about privacy
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

They’re a company, not the government. If you’re receiving mass, and I mean MASS money, they might take action, but it is highly doubtful. They will threaten you numerous times before they would take any serious action.

Read full topic

item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

Since your a slut, no

but really, how do you think those big servers are still online, they just can’t really
